column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Really disappointed with this place. I was here once with colleagues and the food was delicious
column2: service left something be desired but I said I'd give this it the benefit of the doubt and return. I came back with my mom and boyfriend. Our server could not have been ruder
column3: she corrected my mom on her pronunciation of a beer
column4: and our entire table got the impression that she felt we were beneath the place. We also got a really poor table when there were plenty of other
